definition: to make every effort to/striving to do one's best
power/force/strength/ability/strenuously
surname Li
to seek/to look for/to request/to demand/to beseech

sentences.english: We have to base itself, potential, and strengthen the goal, and strive to become.
sentences.chinese: 我們要立足自身，挖掘潛力，強化目標，力求成才。

sentences.english: Will make every effort to achieve will drop an intestinal juices introduction large intestine deeper spot.
sentences.chinese: 力求做到將滴腸液引入大腸更深的部位。

sentences.english: We practised various austerities to make our money last longer.
sentences.chinese: 我們在各方面力求節省以便錢能用久一點。

sentences.english: The author seeks to break the methods he created yesterday and move on towards unexplored territory.
sentences.chinese: 作者在寫作方法上力求不斷突破，去探索未知的領地。

sentences.english: We will reinforce the sales promotion member's selling enthusiasm , will make every effort to raise a product selling amounts.
sentences.chinese: 我們將加強促銷員的售賣積極性，力求提高產品銷量。

sentences.english: We try to achieve what we can afford, and to achieve our mission.
sentences.chinese: 我們竭盡所能，力求不辱使命。

sentences.english: We will enhance our sales persons' enthusiasm, making every effort to improve the sales amount.
sentences.chinese: 我們將加強促銷員的售賣積極性，力求提高產品銷量。

sentences.english: Wulff told reporters that he had asked to keep security measures as low-key as possible.
sentences.chinese: 伍爾夫告訴記者，他之前就要求維安措施力求低調。

sentences.english: We endeavour to avoid the old, romantic idea of a gusher .
sentences.chinese: 我們力求避免那種陳舊的，富有浪漫色彩的噴油方式。

sentences.english: We will do our Best to make Both the market Brisk and prices staBle.
sentences.chinese: 我們要力求做到既繁榮市場，又穩定物價。

sentences.english: Our country must drive at increasing agricultural production.
sentences.chinese: 我國必須力求農業增產。

sentences.english: Fashion designers make every effort to show variety and create something new to attract attention.
sentences.chinese: 時裝設計師要不停地推陳出新，力求花樣百出。

sentences.english: Strive for constant improvement and take responsibility for your own performance.
sentences.chinese: 力求上進並對自己的本職工作負責。

sentences.english: On such highly divisive issues you must strive to remain objective.
sentences.chinese: 在這樣高度分歧的問題上，你必須力求保持客觀。

sentences.english: Before feeding is best for jackets, and strive to clean and sanitary.
sentences.chinese: 餵奶前最好換件外衣，力求乾淨衛生。

sentences.english: Role-based business intelligence seeks to achieve more relevance .
sentences.chinese: 基於角色的商業智能力求取得更多的相關性。

definition: to try hard to/to strive to
as far as possible/to do one's utmost
to work hard for/to do all one can/to contend strongly
to perfect sth that is already outstanding (idiom); constantly improving
in order to/hoping to/attempting to/waiting for
in order to
objective/aim/goal
based on.../in conformance with../taking as one's main principle
all around/omnidirectional/complete/holistic/comprehensive
to take orders/to receive commands/to carry on (a tradition)
to uphold/to hold fast to
perfect (idiom); perfection/the best of all possible worlds/as good as it gets
idea/concept/philosophy/theory
to ensure/to guarantee
to pay attention to/to emphasize
to restore to the original state/to reconstruct (an event)/reduction (chemistry)
